verses.verse: And when the people <S%H5971><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that Moses <S%H4872><s%> delayed <S%H954><s%> to come <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> out of the mount, <S%H2022><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> gathered <S%H6950><s%> themselves together to Aaron, <S%H175><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to him, Up, make <S%H6213><s%> us gods, <S%H430><s%> which <S%H834><s%> shall go <S%H3212><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> us; for as for this <S%H2088><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> that brought <S%H5927><s%> us up out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> we know <S%H3045><s%> not what <S%H4100><s%> is become <S%H1961><s%> of him.

And Aaron <S%H175><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, Break <S%H6561><s%> off the golden <S%H2091><s%> earrings, <S%H5141><s%> which <S%H834><s%> are in the ears <S%H241><s%> of your wives, <S%H802><s%> of your sons, <S%H1121><s%> and of your daughters, <S%H1323><s%> and bring <S%H935><s%> them to me.

And all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> broke <S%H6561><s%> off the golden <S%H2091><s%> earrings <S%H5141><s%> which <S%H834><s%> were in their ears, <S%H241><s%> and brought <S%H935><s%> them to Aaron. <S%H175><s%>

And he received <S%H3947><s%> them at their hand, <S%H3027><s%> and fashioned <S%H3335><s%> it with a engraving <S%H2747><s%> tool, after he had made <S%H6213><s%> it a molten <S%H4541><s%> calf: <S%H5695><s%> and they said, <S%H559><s%> These <S%H428><s%> be your gods, <S%H430><s%> O Israel, <S%H3478><s%> which <S%H834><s%> brought <S%H5927><s%> you up out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

And when Aaron <S%H175><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> it, he built <S%H1129><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> it; and Aaron <S%H175><s%> made proclamation, <S%H7121><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> To morrow <S%H4279><s%> is a feast <S%H2282><s%> to the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And they rose <S%H7925><s%> up early <S%H7925><s%> on the morrow, <S%H4283><s%> and offered <S%H5927><s%> burnt <S%H5930><s%> offerings, and brought <S%H5066><s%> peace <S%H8002><s%> offerings; and the people <S%H5971><s%> sat <S%H3427><s%> down to eat <S%H398><s%> and to drink, <S%H8354><s%> and rose <S%H6965><s%> up to play. <S%H6711><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Go, <S%H3212><s%> get <S%H3381><s%> you down; <S%H3381><s%> for your people, <S%H5971><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you brought <S%H5927><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> have corrupted <S%H7843><s%> themselves:

They have turned <S%H5493><s%> aside quickly <S%H4118><s%> out of the way <S%H1870><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I commanded <S%H6680><s%> them: they have made <S%H6213><s%> them a molten <S%H4541><s%> calf, <S%H5695><s%> and have worshipped <S%H7812><s%> it, and have sacrificed <S%H2076><s%> thereunto, and said, <S%H559><s%> These <S%H428><s%> be your gods, <S%H430><s%> O Israel, <S%H3478><s%> which <S%H834><s%> have brought <S%H5927><s%> you up out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> I have seen <S%H7200><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> it is a stiff necked <S%H7186><s%> <S%H6203><s%> people: <S%H5971><s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore let me alone, that my wrath <S%H639><s%> may wax hot <S%H2734><s%> against them, and that I may consume <S%H3615><s%> them: and I will make <S%H6213><s%> of you a great <S%H1419><s%> nation. <S%H1471><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> sought <S%H2470><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> his God, <S%H430><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> LORD, <S%H3068><s%> why <S%H4100><s%> does your wrath <S%H639><s%> wax hot <S%H2734><s%> against your people, <S%H5971><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you have brought <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> with great <S%H1419><s%> power, <S%H3581><s%> and with a mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand? <S%H3027><s%>

Why <S%H4100><s%> should the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> speak, <S%H559><s%> and say, <S%H559><s%> For mischief <S%H7451><s%> did he bring <S%H3318><s%> them out, to slay <S%H2026><s%> them in the mountains, <S%H2022><s%> and to consume <S%H3615><s%> them from the face <S%H6440><s%> of the earth? <S%H127><s%> Turn <S%H7725><s%> from your fierce <S%H2740><s%> wrath, <S%H639><s%> and repent <S%H5162><s%> of this evil <S%H7451><s%> against your people. <S%H5971><s%>

Remember <S%H2142><s%> Abraham, <S%H85><s%> Isaac, <S%H3327><s%> and Israel, <S%H3478><s%> your servants, <S%H5650><s%> to whom <S%H834><s%> you swore <S%H7650><s%> by your own self, and said <S%H1696><s%> to them, I will multiply <S%H7235><s%> your seed <S%H2233><s%> as the stars <S%H3556><s%> of heaven, <S%H8064><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> land <S%H776><s%> that I have spoken <S%H559><s%> of will I give <S%H5414><s%> to your seed, <S%H2233><s%> and they shall inherit <S%H5157><s%> it for ever. <S%H5769><s%>
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> repented <S%H5162><s%> of the evil <S%H7451><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he thought <S%H1696><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> to his people. <S%H5971><s%>

And Moses turned, <S%H6437><s%> and went <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> from the mount, <S%H2022><s%> and the two <S%H8147><s%> tables <S%H3871><s%> of the testimony <S%H5715><s%> were in his hand: <S%H3027><s%> the tables <S%H3871><s%> were written <S%H3789><s%> on both <S%H8147><s%> their sides; <S%H5676><s%> on the one side and on the other <S%H2088><s%> were they written. <S%H3789><s%>

And the tables <S%H3871><s%> were the work <S%H4639><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> and the writing <S%H4385><s%> was the writing <S%H4385><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> graven <S%H2801><s%> on the tables. <S%H3871><s%>

And when Joshua <S%H3091><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> the noise <S%H6963><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> as they shouted, <S%H7452><s%> he said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> There is a noise <S%H6963><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%> in the camp. <S%H4264><s%>

And he said, <S%H559><s%> It is not the voice <S%H6963><s%> of them that shout <S%H6030><s%> for mastery, <S%H1369><s%> neither <S%H369><s%> is it the voice <S%H6963><s%> of them that cry <S%H6030><s%> for being overcome: <S%H2476><s%> but the noise <S%H6963><s%> of them that sing <S%H6031><s%> do I hear. <S%H8085><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, as soon <S%H834><s%> as he came <S%H7126><s%> near <S%H7126><s%> to the camp, <S%H4264><s%> that he saw <S%H7200><s%> the calf, <S%H5695><s%> and the dancing: <S%H4246><s%> and Moses' <S%H4872><s%> anger <S%H639><s%> waxed hot, <S%H2734><s%> and he cast <S%H7993><s%> the tables <S%H3871><s%> out of his hands, <S%H3027><s%> and broke <S%H7665><s%> them beneath <S%H8478><s%> the mount. <S%H2022><s%>

And he took <S%H3947><s%> the calf <S%H5695><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they had made, <S%H6213><s%> and burnt <S%H8313><s%> it in the fire, <S%H784><s%> and ground <S%H2912><s%> it to powder, <S%H1854><s%> and strewed <S%H2219><s%> it on the water, <S%H4325><s%> and made the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> drink <S%H8248><s%> of it.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Aaron, <S%H175><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> to you, that you have brought <S%H935><s%> so great <S%H1419><s%> a sin <S%H2401><s%> on them?

And Aaron <S%H175><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Let not the anger <S%H639><s%> of my lord <S%H113><s%> wax hot: <S%H2734><s%> you know <S%H3045><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> that they are set on mischief. <S%H7451><s%>

For they said <S%H559><s%> to me, Make <S%H6213><s%> us gods, <S%H430><s%> which <S%H834><s%> shall go <S%H3212><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> us: for as for this <S%H2088><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> that brought <S%H5927><s%> us up out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> we know <S%H3045><s%> not what <S%H4100><s%> is become <S%H1961><s%> of him.

And I said <S%H559><s%> to them, Whoever <S%H4310><s%> has any gold, <S%H2091><s%> let them break <S%H6561><s%> it off. So they gave <S%H5414><s%> it me: then I cast <S%H7993><s%> it into the fire, <S%H784><s%> and there came <S%H3318><s%> out this calf. <S%H5695><s%>

And when Moses <S%H4872><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that the people <S%H5971><s%> were naked; <S%H6544><s%> (for Aaron <S%H175><s%> had made them naked <S%H6544><s%> to their shame <S%H8103><s%> among their enemies: <S%H6965><s%>)

Then Moses <S%H4872><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> in the gate <S%H8179><s%> of the camp, <S%H4264><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Who <S%H4310><s%> is on the LORD's <S%H3068><s%> side? let him come to me. And all <S%H3605><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%> gathered <S%H622><s%> themselves together to him.

And he said <S%H559><s%> to them, Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> Put <S%H7760><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> his sword <S%H2719><s%> by his side, <S%H3409><s%> and go <S%H5674><s%> in and out from gate <S%H8179><s%> to gate <S%H8179><s%> throughout the camp, <S%H4264><s%> and slay <S%H2026><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> his brother, <S%H251><s%> and every man <S%H376><s%> his companion, <S%H7453><s%> and every man <S%H376><s%> his neighbor. <S%H7138><s%>

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> according to the word <S%H1697><s%> of Moses: <S%H4872><s%> and there fell <S%H5307><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> that day <S%H3117><s%> about three <S%H7969><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> men. <S%H376><s%>

For Moses <S%H4872><s%> had said, <S%H559><s%> Consecrate <S%H4390><s%> <S%H3027><s%> yourselves <S%H3027><s%> today <S%H3117><s%> to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> even <S%H3588><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> on his son, <S%H1121><s%> and on his brother; <S%H251><s%> that he may bestow <S%H5414><s%> on you a blessing <S%H1293><s%> this day. <S%H3117><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass on the morrow, <S%H4283><s%> that Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the people, <S%H5971><s%> You have sinned <S%H2398><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> sin: <S%H2401><s%> and now <S%H6258><s%> I will go <S%H5927><s%> up to the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> peradventure <S%H194><s%> I shall make an atonement <S%H3722><s%> for your sin. <S%H2403><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Oh, <S%H577><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> have sinned <S%H2398><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> sin, <S%H2401><s%> and have made <S%H6213><s%> them gods <S%H430><s%> of gold. <S%H2091><s%>

Yet now, <S%H6258><s%> if <S%H518><s%> you will forgive <S%H5375><s%> their sin; <S%H2403><s%> and if <S%H518><s%> not, blot <S%H4229><s%> me, I pray <S%H4994><s%> you, out of your book <S%H5612><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you have written. <S%H3789><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Whoever <S%H4310><s%> <S%H834><s%> has sinned <S%H2398><s%> against me, him will I blot <S%H4229><s%> out of my book. <S%H5612><s%>

Therefore now <S%H6258><s%> go, <S%H3212><s%> lead <S%H5148><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> to the place of which <S%H834><s%> I have spoken <S%H1696><s%> to you: behold, <S%H2009><s%> my Angel <S%H4397><s%> shall go <S%H3212><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you: nevertheless in the day <S%H3117><s%> when I visit <S%H6485><s%> I will visit <S%H6485><s%> their sin <S%H2403><s%> on them.

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> plagued <S%H5062><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> because <S%H5921><s%> <S%H834><s%> they made <S%H6213><s%> the calf, <S%H5695><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> made. <S%H6213><s%>
